name: MAELTROPOLIS
description:
METROPOLIS

You are thrown into a post-apocalyptic world where the seas have risen and cities have fallen, with the remnants of humanity struggling to survive against all odds. 

MaelTropolis offers a unique mix of survival and city-building gameplay, where you must dance a tightrope to balance resource management and city-building,  to survive the calamities and the challenges of a world on the brink of collapse. 

However, be warned, MaelTropolis is not for the faint of heart, as it offers a truly challenging experience that will test even the most skilled of players. So, if you think you have what it takes to lead your city to survival, then download now and face the maelstrom head-on.

CREATED BY
  •         Swagturtle - Programmer and Game Designer
  •         DeejayTM - Composer and 3D modeler
SOME OTHER NOTES

The game's difficulty may cause initial frustration and it may seem like fate is against you, with little time to build an effective defense against the disasters. But for those who persist and continue to struggle, the sense of accomplishment upon realizing how far you've come makes it all worth it...

Try to get Townhall LV3 asap

Try to get max border upgrades asap

Please click on "Help" if you are stuck it will greatly increase your chances of survival
